Name: Belote - Learn & Play
About the game: Suitable for beginners and veteran players alike, Belote is a classical 32-card, trick-taking, Ace-Ten game. Belote - Play & Learn has three different modes (two, three and four players) and let you save your game to finish them later. Take risks, forecast ahead to progress and win more games!
